item.title: [unf] Juggletron
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Clown Robot

Trample

Whenever Juggletron attacks, you may put an art sticker on it.

Juggletron gets +3/+0 for each item in its art that's not touching Juggletron, another item, or the card frame.

item.title: [unf] Devil K. Nevil
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Devil Performer

Haste

When Devil K. Nevil enters the battlefield, jump it over any number of creatures. If it clears those creatures, put that many +1/+1 counters on it. (You can see a jumping demonstration at DevilKNevil.com.)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=48_HnnUD0KA

item.title: [unf] Devil K. Nevil
item.description:

Haste

When Devil K. Nevil enters the battlefield, jump it over any number of creatures. If it clears those creatures, put that many +1/+1 counters on it. (You can see a jumping demonstration at DevilKNevil.com.)

item.title: [unf] Gift Shop
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Choose one that hasn't been chosen.

• Create a 1/1 red Balloon creature token with flying.

• Create a 2/2 pink Teddy Bear creature token.

• Create two Food tokens.

• You get {TIX}{TIX}{TIX}.

• You may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you owne.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/unfinity

item.title: [unf] Gift Shop
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Choose one that hasn't been chosen.

• Create a 1/1 red Balloon creature token with flying.

• Create a 2/2 pink Teddy Bear creature token.

• Create two Food tokens.

• You get {TIX}{TIX}{TIX}.

• You may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you owne.

item.title: [unf] Priority Boarding
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever you roll a die, you may reveal the top card of your library. Do this only once each turn. Whenever you reveal a card with mana value less than the result this way, you may exile it. If you do, you may play it this turn.

https://articles.starcitygames.com/magic-the-gathering/unfinitys-priority-boarding-gives-red-another-die-roll-payoff/

item.title: [unf] Gray Merchant of Alphabet
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Performer

When Gray Merchant of Alphabet enters the battlefield, choose a letter. For each creature you control that has the chosen letter in tis name, you gain 1 life and each opponent loses 1 life.

https://twitter.com/Theasianavenger/status/1572626231576895491

item.title: [unf] Ticking Mime Bomb
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Clown Robot Mime

When Ticking Mime Bomb enters the battlefield, without speaking or indicating any specific creature, pantomime to a person outside the game, then they choose a creature you don't control. Ticking Mime Bomb deals damage equal to twice the number of Robots you control to the chosen creature.

item.title: [unf] Memory Test
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

When Memory Test enters the battlefield, target opponent exiles cards from the bottom of their library until they exile five nonland cards, then turn those nonland cards face down.

Visit — Name the exiled face-down cards, then look at them. If you named them correctly, turn them face up, then claim the prize!

Prize — Create three 1/1 red Balloon creature tokens with flying, then sacrifice Memory Test and open an Attraction.

https://game.naver.com/lounge/mtgko/board/detail/913753

item.title: [unf] Memory Test
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

When Memory Test enters the battlefield, target opponent exiles cards from the bottom of their library until they exile five nonland cards, then turn those nonland cards face down.

Visit — Name the exiled face-down cards, then look at them. If you named them correctly, turn them face up, then claim the prize!

Prize — Create three 1/1 red Balloon creature tokens with flying, then sacrifice Memory Test and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Roller Coaster
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IG7orvd_ClY

item.title: [unf] Truss, Chief Engineer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vedalken Rogue Employee

Whenever Truss, Chief Engineer enters the battlefield or another creature dies, put a hack counter on Truss.

{2}, {T}, Remove X hack counters from Truss: Add or subtract X from a number or word on target spell or permanent until end of turn. This effect can't reduce a number below 1 or a number word below one.

https://www.gamersky.com/news/202209/1520716.shtml

item.title: [unf] Roller Coaster
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [unf] A Real Handful
item.description:
Creature — Alien Child Guest

As long as one or more hands are touching A Real Handful, it gets +2/+2.

As long as two or more hands are touching A Real Handful, it has menace.

As long as three or more hands are touching, it has lifelink.

https://twitter.com/Chosler/status/1572656103426756609

item.title: [unf] Squirrel Stack
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — You have five seconds to stack dice on top of one another. If you stack at least five dice, claim the prize.

Prize — Create a 1/1 green Squirrle creature token for each die you stack above the fourht, then sacrifice Squirrel Stack and open an Attraction.

https://twitter.com/wizards_magic/status/1572677049508311040

item.title: [unf] Night Shift of the Living Dead
item.description:
Enchantment

After you roll a die, you may pay 1 life. If you do, increase or decrease the result by 1. Do this only once each turn.

Whenever you roll a 6, create a 2/2 black Zombie Employee creature token.

https://www.instagram.com/reel/Cix5m6jJalC/

item.title: [unf] Trash Bin
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Mill two cards, then return a card at random from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)

https://twitter.com/Garbage_Andy/status/1572707292344385536

item.description:

Visit — Mill two cards, then return a card at random from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)

item.title: [unf] Opening Ceremony
item.description:
Sorcery

Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}{C}. You may open a sealed Magic booster pack. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among cards in that booster pack.

https://www.pcgamer.com/exclusive-magic-the-gathering-unfinity-card-reveal-opening-ceremony/

item.title: [unf] Ignacio of Myra's Marvels
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Lizard Performer

As Ignacio of Myra's Marvels enters the battlefield, choose armor, blood, book, bottle, fang, fire, scroll, spear, sword, or water.

Whenever you cast a spell with the chosen object in its art, create two Treasure tokens.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

https://shopee.sg/Magic-The-Gathering-Unfinity-Draft-Booster-i.520514080.17885334102

item.title: [unf] Don't Try This at Home
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a hot source you control would deal damage, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead. (Something is hot if it has hot things in its art, like fire or explosion.)

{1}{R}, Sacrifice Don't Try This at Home: It deals damage equal to twice the number of hot cards in your graveyard to target creature or planeswalker.

https://twitter.com/zopilotegarcia/status/1572749450732511232

item.title: [unf] Celebr-8000
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Clown Robot

At the beginning of combat on your turn, roll two six-sided dice. For each result of 1, Celebr-8000 gets +1/+1 until end of turn. For each other result, it gains the indicated ability until end of turn. If you rolled doubles, it also gains double strike until end of turn.

• 2 — menace

• 3 — vigilance

• 4 — lifelink

• 5 — flying

• 6 — indestructible

https://twitter.com/Zapgaze/status/1572510561698709504

item.title: [unf] Goblin Cruciverbalist
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Wizard Guest

Haste

When Goblin Cruciverbalist enters the battlefield, create a colorless artifact token named your choice of A, E, I, O, or U.

Whenever Goblin Cruciverbalist attacks, using the first letters of names of permanents you control, spell a word you haven't spelled this game. It gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each letter in that word.

https://geekculture.co/magic-the-gathering-unfinity-preview-card-goblin-cruciverbalist-wants-to-test-your-scrabble-skills/

item.title: [unf] _____ _____ Rocketship
item.description:
Artifact — Vehicle

Flying

When this Vehicle enters the battlefield, you may put up to two name stickers on it.

Whenever this Vehicle attacks, choose a letter. This Vehicle gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each name sticker on it that begins with the chosen letter.

Crew 2

https://iyingdi.com/tz/post/5220208

item.title: [unf] D00-DL, Caricaturist
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Robot

When D00-DL, Caricaturist enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 colorless Sketch creature token, which you have fifteen seconds to draw. The token has flying if it has wings in its art. The same is true for first strike and a sword, vigilance and a shield, menace and mean eyes, trample and horns, deathtouch and claws, lifelink and fangs, and haste and footwear.

item.description:

Visit — Tap target creature an opponent controls.

item.title: [unf] Greatest Show in the Multiverse
item.description:
Artifact Enchantment — Saga

(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile five instant and/or sorcery cards you own with the same artist and different names from outside the game.

I, II, III — Choose one of the exiled cards at random. You may cast it without paying its mana cost.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1596322656

item.title: [unf] Robo-Piñata
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Clown Robot

When Robo-Piñata dies, choose one —

• You get {TIX}{TIX}.

• You may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own.

https://cdn1.mtggoldfish.com/images/h/Robo-Pinata-UNF-672.jpg

item.title: [unf] Centrifuge
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Each player draws a card from the library of the player to their right. You create three Treasure tokens.

item.title: [unf] Wizards of the _____
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard Performer

When this creature enters the battlefield, you may put a name sticker on it, then look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of unique vowels on that sticker. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. (The vowels are A, E, I, O, U, and Y.)

item.title: [unf] Centrifuge
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Each player draws a card from the library of the player to their right. You create three Treasure tokens.

item.title: [unf] "Lifetime" Pass Holder
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Guest

"Lifetime" Pass Holder enters the battlefield tapped.

When "Lifetime" Pass Holder dies, open an Attraction.

Whenever you roll to visit your Attractions, if you roll a 6, you may return "Lifetime" Pass Holder from your graveyard to the battlefield.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1596322656

item.title: [unf] Dart Throw
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Throw a card you own from outside the game onto the playing area from a distance of three feet (about one meter). If that card touches Dart Throw, claim the prize!

Prize — Create two 2/2 pink Teddy Bear creature tokens. Sacrifice Dart Throw, then open an Attraction.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1596322656
